law.text: The following words as used in this chapter, unless the context otherwise requires, shall have the following meanings:— “Annual meeting”, the meeting of corporators required by section nine A to be held annually. “Commissioner”, the commissioner of banks. “Corporator”, an original incorporator, or a person elected as a corporator as provided by section nine. “Deposit book”, a passbook or other instrument which a savings bank issued to the depositor as evidence of his account. “Interest”, payments to depositors as provided by section twenty-nine. “Guaranty fund, surplus, unallocated reserves and undivided profits”, the surplus accounts required to be established and maintained by section twenty-seven. “Savings bank”, a savings bank, institution for savings or savings institution incorporated as such in this commonwealth. “Such corporation” or “such bank”, a savings bank, institution for savings and a savings institution incorporated as such in this commonwealth.
